name: NATURAL FIBER ALLIANCE
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the fur industry to include farming, retail, manufacturing and trade. Lacey Act amendments in USICA.

Educate members and staff on issues related to ranching of mink; oppose amendments to House COMPETES Act to ban farming of American mink; discuss assistance to farmers impacted by market disruptions d
Oppose efforts to amend the Lacey Act to prohibit the farming, transport, import and export of American mink; oppose HR 4310.
